definitions.definition: With respect to a given category ; a narrower category .
A subclass of a category which is itself a category, whose arrows are a restriction of the arrows of the parent category, and whose composition rule is a restriction of the parent category's.

main_definition: With respect to a given category ; a narrower category .
secondary_definitions: ( category theory ) A subclass of a category which is itself a category, whose arrows are a restriction of the arrows of the parent category, and whose composition rule is a restriction of the parent category's.
